author: philcares
content: How fast is migration possible? Like are there any time constraints by design to switch clients?

author: somer112
content:
<@!707707212184944702> I think it could be quite fast if you keep a beacon node for a second client running in sync with your Eth1 node without running its validator. If the first client gets into trouble you shut it off and fire up the validator for the second client.
Time constraint is that you'd have to be careful not to get slashed by making sure the validator for the second client isn't acting in the same epoch as the first client. So worst case ~6.5 mins? If the second client has slashing protection you wouldn't need to worry.

author: philcares
content: Ok, that sounds reasonable. Are you keeping a beacon node for a second client running?
